description: A Biospecimen is any natural material taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostics, treatment, or research purposes.  It is linked to the Individual from which the Biospecimen is derived.

age_at_sampling.description: Enum to capture the age range that an Indiviudal belongs to.
age_at_sampling.title: AgeRangeEnum

description.description: A concise description about the Biospecimen source, the collection method, and the protocol which was followed to process this Biospecimen.

isolation.description: Method or device employed for collecting/isolating this Biospecimen.

name.description: A descriptive name of this Biospecimen (e.g., GHGAB_caudate_nucleus_biospecimen). This property must not include any personally identifiable data.

storage.description: Enum to capture how a Sample or Biospecimen was stored.
storage.title: StorageEnum

tissue.description: The tissue this Biospecimen originated from.

vital_status_at_sampling.description: Enum to capture the vital status of an individual.
vital_status_at_sampling.title: VitalStatusEnum

title: Biospecimen
